title: Blocking Step
intro: A Blocking Step is a property given to a step during the design of a template. When ran, the template will only show subsequent steps (to the “blocking step) when the blocking step is answered.

blocks.content: Under a Template step options you can simply enable the step as “blocking” by tapping it.

blocks.caption: There is no visual cue that there is a blocking step from a user perspective. 2.2 is a “blocking step”.
Once the step is answered the rest of the Template originally blocked by the blocking step will appear.
